title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 08, 2023
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Nov 08, 2023 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Learning and Courses

*   [Digiscreen](https://ladigitale.dev/digiscreen/) - Interactive whiteboard/wallpaper for the classroom, in person or remotely (documentation in French). ([Demo](https://ladigitale.dev/digiscreen/), [Source Code](https://codeberg.org/ladigitale/digiscreen)) `AGPL-3.0` `Nodejs/PHP`

### Software / Self-hosting Solutions

*   [StartOS](https://start9.com) - Browser-based, graphical Operating System (OS) that makes running a personal server as easy as running a personal computer. ([Source Code (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/Start9Labs/start-os)) `MIT` `Rust`
items.content_html:
Software / Learning and Courses

  • Digiscreen - Interactive whiteboard/wallpaper for the classroom, in person or remotely (documentation in French). (Demo, Source Code) AGPL-3.0 Nodejs/PHP

Software / Self-hosting Solutions

  • StartOS - Browser-based, graphical Operating System (OS) that makes running a personal server as easy as running a personal computer. (Source Code (‚≠ê1.2k)) MIT Rust

items.title: Awesome Sitecore
items.content_text:
### Containers

*   [Repository of Sitecore Docker images (‚≠ê180)](https://github.com/Sitecore/docker-images) - Build your own Docker images for the most recent versions of Sitecore.
items.content_html:
Containers

  • Repository of Sitecore Docker images (‚≠ê180) - Build your own Docker images for the most recent versions of Sitecore.

items.title: Awesome Falsehood
items.content_text:
### Internationalization

*   [Localization Failure: Temperature is Hard](https://randomascii.wordpress.com/2023/10/17/localization-failure-temperature-is-hard/) - You cannot localize temperature differences as-is.

### Postal Addresses

*   [UK Address Oddities](https://paulplowman.com/stuff/uk-address-oddities/) - Quirks extracted from a list of most residential property sales in England and Wales since 1995.
items.content_html:
Internationalization

  • Localization Failure: Temperature is Hard - You cannot localize temperature differences as-is.

Postal Addresses

  • UK Address Oddities - Quirks extracted from a list of most residential property sales in England and Wales since 1995.

items.title: Awesome Cyber Security University
items.content_text:
### Free Beginner Red Team Path / Level 2 - Tooling

*   [Nmap,Curl and Netcat](https://echoctf.red/challenge/1) - Get experience with Nmap, Curl and Netcat for network communications.

### Free Beginner Blue Team Path / Level 3 - Beginner Forensics, Threat Intel & Cryptography

*   [Intel101 Challenge](https://cyberdefenders.org/blueteam-ctf-challenges/38) - Medium level Threat Intel challenge.
items.content_html:
Free Beginner Red Team Path / Level 2 - Tooling

  • Nmap,Curl and Netcat - Get experience with Nmap, Curl and Netcat for network communications.

Free Beginner Blue Team Path / Level 3 - Beginner Forensics, Threat Intel & Cryptography

  • Intel101 Challenge - Medium level Threat Intel challenge.

items.title: Awesome Coq
items.content_text:
### Projects / User Interfaces

*   [VsCoq (‚≠ê392)](https://github.com/coq-community/vscoq) - Language server and extension for the Visual Studio Code and VSCodium editors.
*   [VsCoq Legacy (‚≠ê392)](https://github.com/coq-community/vscoq/tree/vscoq1) - Backwards-compatible extension for the Visual Studio Code and VSCodium editors using Coq's legacy XML protocol.

### Projects / Verified Software

*   [WasmCert-Coq (‚≠ê106)](https://github.com/WasmCert/WasmCert-Coq/) - Formalization in Coq of the WebAssembly (aka Wasm) 1.0 specification.

### Resources / Blogs

*   [MIT PLV blog posts on Coq](http://plv.csail.mit.edu/blog/category/coq.html)
items.content_html:
Projects / User Interfaces

  • VsCoq (‚≠ê392) - Language server and extension for the Visual Studio Code and VSCodium editors.
  • VsCoq Legacy (‚≠ê392) - Backwards-compatible extension for the Visual Studio Code and VSCodium editors using Coq's legacy XML protocol.

Projects / Verified Software

  • WasmCert-Coq (‚≠ê106) - Formalization in Coq of the WebAssembly (aka Wasm) 1.0 specification.

Resources / Blogs

  • MIT PLV blog posts on Coq

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [vue-file-upload (‚≠ê34)](https://github.com/canopas/vue-file-upload) - A file management system built with `Vue3` and `TypeScript` that allows for single and multiple file uploading with a preview feature.

### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Helpers

*   [vite-plugin-auto-origin (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/s2b/vite-plugin-auto-origin) - Detect origin configuration automatically based on incoming requests to dev server.
items.content_html:
Templates / Vue 3

  • vue-file-upload (‚≠ê34) - A file management system built with Vue3 and TypeScript that allows for single and multiple file uploading with a preview feature.

Framework-agnostic Plugins / Helpers

  • vite-plugin-auto-origin (‚≠ê3) - Detect origin configuration automatically based on incoming requests to dev server.

items.title: Awesome Python
items.content_text:
### GUI Development

*   [PyGObject](https://pygobject.readthedocs.io/) - Python Bindings for GLib/GObject/GIO/GTK+ (GTK+3).

### Game Development

*   [Cocos2d](https://www.cocos.com/en/cocos2d-x) - cocos2d is a framework for building 2D games, demos, and other graphical/interactive applications.

### Science

*   [Open Babel](https://open-babel.readthedocs.io/) - A chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data.
items.content_html:
GUI Development

  • PyGObject - Python Bindings for GLib/GObject/GIO/GTK+ (GTK+3).

Game Development

  • Cocos2d - cocos2d is a framework for building 2D games, demos, and other graphical/interactive applications.

Science

  • Open Babel - A chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data.

items.title: Awesome Generative Deep Art
items.content_text:
### Large Language Models (LLMs)

*   \[üî•üî•] [State of LLM Apps 2023 ¬∑ Streamlit](https://state-of-llm.streamlit.app/)

### Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

*   [Forget RAG, the Future is RAG-Fusion](https://towardsdatascience.com/forget-rag-the-future-is-rag-fusion-1147298d8ad1): post by Adrian H. Raudaschl in Towards Data Science

### Image Segmentation / Deforum

*   [AILab-CVC/VideoCrafter (‚≠ê4.9k)](https://github.com/ailab-cvc/videocrafter): Open Diffusion Models for High-Quality Video Generation

### Speech-to-text (STT) and spoken content analysis / Deforum

*   [Vaibhavs10/insanely-fast-whisper (‚≠ê8.5k)](https://github.com/Vaibhavs10/insanely-fast-whisper): accelerates transcription with the combination of OpenAI's Whisper Large v2, HF Transformers, Optimum, and flash attention
items.content_html:
Large Language Models (LLMs)

  • [üî•üî•] State of LLM Apps 2023 ¬∑ Streamlit

Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) / Prompt Engineering for Text-to-image

  • Forget RAG, the Future is RAG-Fusion: post by Adrian H. Raudaschl in Towards Data Science

Image Segmentation / Deforum

  • AILab-CVC/VideoCrafter (‚≠ê4.9k): Open Diffusion Models for High-Quality Video Generation

Speech-to-text (STT) and spoken content analysis / Deforum

  • Vaibhavs10/insanely-fast-whisper (‚≠ê8.5k): accelerates transcription with the combination of OpenAI's Whisper Large v2, HF Transformers, Optimum, and flash attention
